languages.text: "Футфол получил пропитание лишь благодаря милости Домин. Так люди научились полагаться на чужое сострадание — урок беспомощности".

traits.locale_text: "Футфол получил пропитание лишь благодаря милости Домин. Так люди научились полагаться на чужое сострадание — урок беспомощности".

languages.text: "Footfall only received sustenance thanks to the Domin's magnanimity. The people have been taught to rely on the compassion of others — a lesson in helplessness."
languages.original_text: "Футфол получил пропитание лишь благодаря милости Домин. Так люди научились полагаться на чужое сострадание — урок беспомощности".

traits.locale_text: "Footfall only received sustenance thanks to the Domin's magnanimity. The people have been taught to rely on the compassion of others — a lesson in helplessness."
"Footfall only received sustenance thanks to the Domin's magnanimity. The people have been taught to rely on the compassion of others — a lesson in helplessness."
"Footfall only received sustenance thanks to the Domin's magnanimity. The people have been taught to rely on the compassion of others — a lesson in helplessness."
"Footfall only received sustenance thanks to the Domin's magnanimity. The people have been taught to rely on the compassion of others — a lesson in helplessness."
"Footfall only received sustenance thanks to the Domin's magnanimity. The people have been taught to rely on the compassion of others — a lesson in helplessness."
"Footfall only received sustenance thanks to the Domin's magnanimity. The people have been taught to rely on the compassion of others — a lesson in helplessness."

languages.text: «Paso solo recibe suministros por la magnanimidad de{mf|l| la} Domin. A su gente se la ha enseñado a depender de la compasión ajena: una lección de impotencia».
languages.original_text: "Footfall only received sustenance thanks to the Domin's magnanimity. The people have been taught to rely on the compassion of others — a lesson in helplessness."

languages.text: 「フットフォールはドミンの寛大さのおかげで糧を得られただけにすぎません。あの人民は、他者の慈悲に頼ることを教えられてきた…救いがない中での教えです」
languages.original_text: "Footfall only received sustenance thanks to the Domin's magnanimity. The people have been taught to rely on the compassion of others — a lesson in helplessness."

languages.text: “多亏了秘者的仁慈，落脚港才得以为继。落脚港的居民在无助之中学到了这个道理——如果想要活下去，就要依靠他人的同情。”
languages.original_text: "Footfall only received sustenance thanks to the Domin's magnanimity. The people have been taught to rely on the compassion of others — a lesson in helplessness."

languages.text: "Footfall verdankte seine Existenz allein der Großzügigkeit {mf|des|der} Domin. Die Leute wurden gelehrt, sich auf die Barmherzigkeit anderer zu verlassen ... eine Lektion der Hilflosigkeit."
languages.original_text: "Footfall only received sustenance thanks to the Domin's magnanimity. The people have been taught to rely on the compassion of others — a lesson in helplessness."

languages.text: « Ce n'est que parce que {mf|le|la} Domin a fait preuve de magnanimité que Castel a reçu quelque subsistance. Le peuple a appris à compter sur la compassion des autres. Une leçon d'impuissance s'il en faut. »
languages.original_text: "Footfall only received sustenance thanks to the Domin's magnanimity. The people have been taught to rely on the compassion of others — a lesson in helplessness."
"Footfall only received sustenance thanks to the Domin's magnanimity. The people have been taught to rely on the compassion of others — a lesson in helplessness."

languages.text: "Binliman, Domin'in eli açıklığı sayesinde gıda takviyesi alabildi. İnsanlar, diğerlerinin merhametine güvenebileceklerini öğrendiler. Çaresizliğe dair bir ders aldılar."
languages.original_text: "Footfall only received sustenance thanks to the Domin's magnanimity. The people have been taught to rely on the compassion of others — a lesson in helplessness."
